footerDisplay: Presets must be saved on the radio first. The plugin switches between preset numbers.

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: The IP address of the radio on your network.

pin.title: FSAPI PIN
pin.description: FSAPI PIN for the radio. Default is usually 1234.

pollIntervalSeconds.title: Poll interval (seconds)
pollIntervalSeconds.description: How often to poll the device for updates.

exposeSpeakerService.title: Expose Speaker service
exposeSpeakerService.description: Adds a native HomeKit Speaker service using the Volume characteristic.

exposeVolumeSlider.title: Expose Apple Home volume slider
exposeVolumeSlider.description: Adds a Lightbulb Brightness slider for volume control that is visible in the Apple Home app.

autoPowerOnOnPreset.title: Power on when selecting a station
autoPowerOnOnPreset.description: When you turn on a station switch, the radio will be powered on first.

stations.title: Stations
stations.description: List of station switches mapped to preset numbers. Save the stations to presets on the radio first.

display.name: Frontier Silicon Radio
display.description: Control power, volume, and station presets via FSAPI.
